title: Israel-Gaza war: Israel’s defence minister says ‘Gaza is burning’ amid escalation in bombardment - latest updates
summary: Israel Katz has announced a new phase in the Israel Defense Forces' offensive following a visit from U.S. Senator Marco Rubio. This development suggests an escalation in military actions, likely in response to ongoing regional tensions. The announcement underscores the strategic partnership between Israel and the U.S. in addressing security issues.

title: TV tonight: who will win The Great British Sewing Bee?
summary: In tonight's episode, the final three contestants aim to impress the judges with their trompe l’oeil creations. title: Gina Rinehart among donors to Jacinta Nampijinpa Price’s defamation battle
summary: The CEO of the Central Land Council has accused a CLP senator of defamation related to a media release. He claims the senator made false statements that harm his reputation. Legal action may follow as he seeks to address the allegations.

title: Big pharma firms have paused nearly £2bn in UK investments this year
summary: The government's plans are in turmoil ahead of discussions with Trump, as major pharmaceutical companies MSD, Eli Lilly, and AstraZeneca make strategic moves that raise concerns about potential job losses. These developments complicate the administration's agenda and add pressure to address employment issues. Stakeholders worry about the broader implications for the economy and workforce stability.
